name: How Low Can You Go
description:
How Low Can You Go

++ Recommended to play in full screen for best experience ++

How Low Can You Go is  a deep sea diver action/shooter/simulation game where your goal is to survive and dive as deep as you can while fighting off huge sea monsters.

This game was created during 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48 game jam.

Controls

Use the _WASD keys_ to control the camera and find the sea monsters that want you to be their next meal. Once you find a sea monster, use the _mouse_ to aim your harpoon gun and shoot those monsters!

Note that the sea monsters in the deeper ends have developed thicker skin to endure the harsher environment and will take more harpoon shots to die.

Credits

Everything you see (3D Models, animations, code, etc..) with the exception of the game audio is created by yours truly _Saeed Prez_.

Follow me to Twitter and YouTube.
